actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to require notice on social security checks that it is a violation of law to commit forgery in conjunction with the cashing of those checks.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to provide notice on all checks for benefits issued under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act that the commission of forgery in conjunction with the cashing of such checks is a violation of Federal law. Requires that such notice state the maximum penalties for forgery.

titles.title: A bill to require notice on social security checks that it is a violation of law to commit forgery in conjunction with the cashing of those checks.
